QuestData.Title: The Mantid
QuestData.Description: The mantid! They came out of nowhere and smashed our convoy to ruin, scattering our people this way and that.$b$bNow they are preparing to hit Stoneplow.$b$bPlease, $c, destroy some of these beasts before they get sufficient numbers to flank our home.$b$bIf my cousin, Ambassador Len, is still alive and at our convoy he should be able to reward you for your help.
